content:
Hey folks! At present, the gear menu has two different names for organization settings: "Organization settings" for non-admins, and "Manage organization" for admins. As came up in the discussion on #24134, this makes it quite awkward to refer to that option in help center documentation.

Thoughts on dropping the special naming and just using "Organization settings" across the board? That lines up with how we refer to the settings UI itself in help center documentation.
I think having one name, "Organization settings", makes sense.
Yeah, I think that's probably the simplest solution, and "Organization settings" seems like the better of the two names, since it doesn't imply anything about your personal permissions.
I can put up a PR to change "Manage organization" > "Organization settings".
